messages.title: STANDING WITH THERESA MAY
messages.content: Ryan's personal plan for Leeds North East.

messages.title: PUTTING LEEDS NORTH EAST FIRST
messages.content: Ryan is pledging to put this election's key votes at the heart of his work as part of his personal plan for Leeds North East.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Being a strong local voice in Parliament, delivering for local residents.
Addressing school places and academic standards for children.
Bringing more jobs and investment to Leeds North East.
Securing the transport upgrades the area needs.

issues.brexitEurope: Delivering on UK's decision to leave EU, with need for strong leadership in national interest.
issues.governance: Strong national leadership, strong local voice.

leaflet.personalStatement: Ryan's stance is to deliver on a strong national leadership, and a strong local voice.

images.caption: Ryan Stephenson's local plan for Leeds North East.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet showcases the support and endorsement for the candidate by Rt. Hon Theresa May and focuses on the need for strong leadership and the risks posed by the opposition.
